description:
Art + Science of Data Visualization covers a step by step scientific approach to create visuals from data, which are accurate, easy to understand and remember. 

Who should take this course?

Course is a powerful resource for anyone working with numbers in business or academic environment.

In particular, this would be of great help for individuals working or aspiring to be in these roles - analysts, business consultants, trainers, marketing communication professionals, business managers, software developers and user interface designers

How to make best use of this course?

We have split this course into small lessons of 2-3 minutes. Each lesson has some practical take-aways in the form of dos, don’ts and guidelines. We would recommend you to pull out one of your current or old assignment and apply these concepts after each lesson.

Pre-requisites

Software / Tool Know-how: Course is not based on any specific tool. Core concepts covered can be used with any data analysis, charting or visualization tool like excel, powerpoint, Tableau, R-Tool etc.  

Basics of Data Analysis: We assume that students have some basic knowledge / working experience in data analysis and creating graphs / charts.
title: Art + Science of Data Visualization
